lines.text: Did you ever feel like it wouldn't matter if you lived or died?
How you could just disappear, and no one would notice.
I feel like I just hit my peak and past it. Like I'm just waiting to grow old.
Its like meeting up with your own face somewhere, you know like in a dream?
You think your invisible, but I see you. You break, you bend. You dissappear, and everybody here stairs. Maybe you should just go farther.
You don't live in Virinia, you die here. But I'm getting out.
That's a diaper pin in her ear!
So what did you think of Drumstrings Casey?
Well I don't know what the fuck he's jabbering about but with a body like that, who cares.

[Cheering on the band]
I'll see you in my wet dreams, baby! He is so hot. Looks like he's packing a summer squash in them pants.
Hey Evie! I could have sworn I saw you and that porker friend of yours at the concert the other night.
My friend Violet and I did go.

[singing and dancing in Evie's house]
It all comes down to sex!
